{"id":"18","currency_code":"CAD","title":"IQ Perfetto Hair Dryer - Grey ","handle":"","url":"https://beautyroute.com/iq-perfetto-hair-dryer","description":"

1. PRODUCT INFO :

The GA.MA iQ Perfetto is a new era in the history of hairdryers and provides the perfect balance between elegance, modern design and professional performance. The Italian designed gama dryers are manufactured to the highest standard with the most sophisticated technologies, including: Oxy Active Technology, Memory Function, Auto-Clean and Intelligent Brushless Motor.

 2. FOR WHOM / USE : 

The GA.MA iQ Perfetto is unlike any other hair dryer. Its ergonomic design, compact dimensions and light-weight were thoughtfully designed to reduce strain and damage on the arm muscle caused by extensive use of professional hair dryers.It is half the size of any other hair dryer in its class, while drying hair up-to 30% faster, making GA.MA iQ Perfetto a perfect choice for professional and home use.

3. FOR WHAT / BENEFITS : 

• The Lightest Hairdryer in the World
• Dries hair 30% faster than any other professional hairdryer
• Oxy Active Technology
• Temperature and speed memory Function - 3 speeds / 3 temperatures / cool shot
• Auto-clean capability
• Venturi effect
• Auto diagnosis system
• Motor Speed 110.000 rpm
• Power 1700 W
• Pressure 465 mmH20
• Extra Long-Life Motor
• 3m long cord
• Noise 78 db
• Includes : 1 x 96mm (3.65in) Concentrator Nozzle, 1 x 68mm (2.5in) Concentrator Nozzle, 1 x Diffuser

4. ABOUT THE COLLECTION : 

gama.professional is GA.MA Italy’s new premium professional hair technology product line. Sophistication, intelligent design, innovation and revolutionary technologies are blended into products of pure Italian quality.
